summary: The story of matinee idol Tab Hunter from teenage stable boy to closeted Hollywood star of the 1950s.
cast: Clint Eastwood|Natalie Wood|Paul Newman|James Dean|Portia de Rossi|Robert Wagner|Noah Wyle|Rock Hudson|Debbie Reynolds|Terry Moore|Anthony Perkins|Liz Torres|John Waters|George Takei|Connie Stevens|Lainie Kazan|Earl Holliman|Tab Hunter|Gina Gallego|Etchika Choureau|Don Murray|Darryl Hickman|Pat Boone|William Wellman Jr.|Perry Como|Dolores Hart|Steve Allen|Venetia Stevenson|Tennessee Ernie Ford|Rex Reed|Robert Osborne|Allan Glaser|Rae Allen|Marilyn Erskine|Art Linkletter|Dan Rather|Garry Moore|Rona Barrett|Jack L. Warner|Eddie Muller|Henry Willson|Dick Button|Shannon Bolin|Jerry Rubin|Tamara Asseyev|Ronnie Robertson|Peter Potter|Gary Giddins|Neal Noorlag|Evelyn Kramer|Marilyn Gevirtz|Jo-An Cox Bunton|Lou Simon
title: Tab Hunter Confidential
